basic.floral_language:
Euphorbia polychroma
Floriography: passion, self-confidence, self-love 
Euphorbia polychroma leaves bright beautiful, is a common foliage plants. Poinsettia plant is small. Leaf is ovoid. Leaf color is red, pink, orange, white, yellow, or motley etc., bright and colorful. Maintenance is simple, and it may be placed on a corner. Flower bed, flower border decoration or bouquet with leaves.                                  Euphorbia polychroma likes mild sunshine. Properly covered is needed in summer strong light. When condition is appropriate, winter and spring can flower which is light green color.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers during winter and spring
basic.color: Leaf red, peach red, white, yellow or in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water on the leaves in summer, water less frequently in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
